example: This is the best movie I've seen.
That was the worst day of my life.
This is the least expensive option.
The furthest planet is very far away.
He is the best player on the team.
It was the worst performance tonight.
This shop has the most toys.
She has the least homework this week.
That is the furthest I've ever traveled.
This is the best book in the library.
It was the worst weather day.
He has the most friends here.
They had the least time to finish.
The furthest city is three hours away.
